properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued February 14 at 3:26PM EST until February 15 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding expected. In addition,
northern Lake Michigan ice pack will likely get shoved
onshore, increasing potential for significant coastal impacts.

* WHERE...Western Mackinac and Eastern Mackinac Counties.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Potential for road closures and significant flooding
of coastal areas. Ice shove could be significant, potentially
resulting in damage to roads and other structures near the
coast. Some shoreline erosion will occur.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST SATURDAY
